About Serket
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Advance 2 Archive (GameBoy Advance): Miscellaneous Q&A (Post New Questions Here): About Serket
By Infernus on Monday, March 10, 2003 - 08:54 pm:

In the unlocking instructions, #4 says that you must raise the children of 1/2 and 4/5, to A class. I only raised one of those children to A class, combined it with the other to get Arrowhead 7, and then combined it with my Archreaper(master class), Serket was an option. In other words, I don't think that you have to raise the children.

By Thorr on Tuesday, March 11, 2003 - 06:18 am:

The funkiest thing about the thoroughbreds is that they aren't consistent. For instance, with the Whitehound, you can use a no-name-brand Gali to combine. But, with the Serket, you need a Class A Joker to combine. It may be that because the joker needs to be class A, the Arrowheads do not. Just look at the Devi. You need a thoroughbred Mocchi and a thoroughbred Zan, but neither have to be of any rank.

So the real name of the game here is that you can't be sure what the requirements are until you you try it many different ways.

Here are the things I know for SURE:

Whitehound: All tigers MUST be class A. When I tested this out, I found that having 1 bad tiger forced me to start over.

Serket: The Joker MUST be Class A or better. When I created my Thoroughbred arrowhead, and tried to combine with the joker, it didn't happen. I raised the joker and tried every rank until it worked.

When you made the Serket, was it the first time? If it wasn't your first, then you could combine any arrowhead with a joker to get it.

-Thorr
